review: For over a year now, I've been using an HDMI cord to attach my 8.9" Kindle HD to my TV so that I can watch things on a bigger screen and it's always worked for me. Until my parents bought me the Fire TV Stick for Christmas this year. IT'S ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL. It's a smooth set up and has fantastic features. The only downside I've found so far is the small amount of games that are actually available for the TV Stick, but that's not too bad for me, since I use it primarily to stream movies and TV Shows. I wasn't expecting the Stick to be required to plug in to the wall as well as the TV, but as long as you have an extra outlet near your TV, you're golden!
author: Sarah Weisel "theater"
